# Architecture Overview

This section provides a high-level overview of the Symbolic Topological Framework's system design, major components, and how they interact. Understanding the architecture is key for developers contributing to the core codebase.

## Contents:
* [System Overview](system_overview.md)
* Component Interaction Diagrams
* Data Flow Diagrams
* Key Design Decisions

---
Architecture documentation is a living document and will be updated as the framework evolves.
